architectureStyle.description: Crystalline, geometric, extreme heat - designed for silicon-based beings in 450+ Kelvin environments
keyElements: Buildings look like cut gems and crystals
Amber, orange, gold coloring with translucent elements
Extreme heat environment - lethal to most species
No windows in traditional sense - crystalline walls
architectureStyle.colors: Amber, orange, gold, crystal-clear, ruby red accents
architectureStyle.materials: Grown crystals, faceted minerals, heat-resistant matrices, web-silk composites

buildings.name: Assembly Nexus
buildings.description: Ruling body of the xenophobic Tholian Assembly in crystalline splendor

buildings.name: Territorial Command
buildings.description: Coordinating defense of Tholian space from all intruders

buildings.name: Colonial Lattice
buildings.description: Administration for crystalline settlements in extreme heat environments

buildings.name: Diplomatic Prism
buildings.description: Rare contact point for communication with inferior species

buildings.name: Web Generator Station
buildings.description: Producing the famous energy webs that trap enemy ships

buildings.name: Defense Lattice
buildings.description: Crystalline fortification grown from the ground, nearly indestructible

buildings.name: Military Hive
buildings.description: Barracks adapted for 450+ Kelvin temperatures lethal to intruders

buildings.name: Weapons Crystal
buildings.description: Manufacturing armaments from precision-grown combat crystals

buildings.name: Web Anchor
buildings.description: Ground station for planetary defense web deployment

buildings.name: Prison Matrix
buildings.description: Detention in temperatures lethal to most carbon-based species

buildings.name: Crystal Growth Chamber
buildings.description: Cultivating structural crystals for construction and technology

buildings.name: Heat Forge
buildings.description: Manufacturing in temperatures that would melt most metals

buildings.name: Ship Construction
buildings.description: Building geometric Tholian vessels with crystalline precision

buildings.name: Resource Extraction
buildings.description: Mining rare crystals and minerals for Tholian technology

buildings.name: Material Synthesis
buildings.description: Creating specialized crystalline compounds through heat manipulation

buildings.name: Power Lattice
buildings.description: Energy generation for crystalline civilization through heat conversion

buildings.name: Thermal Core
buildings.description: Maintaining the extreme temperatures Tholians require to survive

buildings.name: Science Crystal
buildings.description: Research conducted at temperatures impossible for other species

buildings.name: Technology Nexus
buildings.description: Developing Tholian innovations in crystalline laboratories

buildings.name: Interphasic Research
buildings.description: Studying the mysterious Tholian connection to other dimensions

buildings.name: Web Technology Center
buildings.description: Improving the famous Tholian web to trap ever-larger vessels

buildings.name: Communication Spire
buildings.description: Tholian subspace relay using incomprehensible crystalline protocols

buildings.name: Transit Lattice
buildings.description: Movement through crystalline structures via heat-resistant corridors

buildings.name: Sensor Array
buildings.description: Detecting intrusion into jealously guarded Tholian territory

buildings.name: Medical Lattice
buildings.description: Healthcare for silicon-based lifeforms in extreme conditions

buildings.name: Habitation Crystal
buildings.description: Housing grown from crystalline structures at lethal temperatures

buildings.name: Cultural Matrix
buildings.description: Tholian traditions incomprehensible to carbon-based observers

buildings.name: Memorial Spire
buildings.description: Crystal monument honoring fallen Tholians in geometric patterns

buildings.name: Territorial Marker
buildings.description: Crystalline beacon clearly stating: Keep Out of Tholian space

buildings.name: Diplomatic Holding
buildings.description: Cooled chamber allowing rare meetings with alien visitors

buildings.name: Trade Portal
buildings.description: Rare commerce with outside species through temperature barriers
